author: wadalliance
title: AI Oracles in the African Market
description: Africa's data-enabled infrastructure is underdeveloped. There's a sizeable chasm to fill to enable the full potential of AI & DLT Solutions.
solution: A strategic data-gathering plan is essential to ignite African AI oracles solutions for connecting the physical world to the blockchain.
experience:
